column4: Martha, huyu ni Mercy kutoka kwa Rachuonyo. Asante kwa kuwa nasi kwa Mobile WACh NEO. SMS zitaacha kuja hivi karibuni lakini bado unaweza kuuliza maswali. Je, huu mradi umekuwa wa manufaa kwako na kwa mtoto wako?

Mama Idel, huyu ni Brenda kutoka kwa Mathare. Maumivu ya nguvu ya tumbo ya mara kwa mara ni ishara ya uchungu wa kujifunguwa. Ikiwa unahisi huu uchungu sana mara kwa mara, maji kutoka au damu nenda kwenye kituo. Je, unasikia huu uchungu wowowte? Je, una wasiwasi wowote?

Seline, this is Brenda from Mathare. If your baby has frequent spitting up or vomiting, makes gagging noises and seems uncomfortable, this may be reflux. Smaller more frequent feedings and keeping the baby upright after feeding can help. Is your baby having any isseus with feeding?

Pricillah, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Kuot mar lwedo kod wan'g kata wich mabero matek gin ranyisi mag chandruok. Kwa joodi mondo okeli e klinik kagineno ma. Bende isebedo gi kuot moro amora kata wichbar e kinde ma ipek?Bende gimedore?

Rozzy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. This week our messages will be stopping. Please come in for your final visit with us when your baby is about 14 weeks old. Let us know if you have any difficulty coming in. We would like to know your experience with us and if this service has been helpful. We look forward to seeing you.

Mama Junior, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is safest for all women to deliver in a health facility because health workers have the skills and equipment needed to help ensure a safe delivery and a healthy baby. Where do you plan to deliver?

Mama Prince, this is Brenda from Mathare. By two weeks old a typical newborn may cry up to 2 hours a day. Make sure your baby is not hungry, tired or has a soiled diaper. Pay attention to what soothes your baby like singing, rocking, swaddling or sucking. Does your baby cry for more than 30 minutes at a time? Are you having any problems?
Makasi, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wewe na mtoto wako mnaendeleaje? Mtoto wako ana wiki tatu hivi sasa. Je, ulimpeleka kliniki ya wiki mbili ya kuangaliwa?

Mama Sheldon, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies normally poo once per day but some go more often. If your baby is going less than three times per week and is fussy they may need some help. Are you having any concerns?

Sharon, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. IUCD au Coil inaufanisi sana kwa upangaji uzazi.ni rahisi kuweka ndani,salama kwa miaka.IUCD au coil yaweza kutolewa wakati wowote!uliza juu ya coil kwa ziara yako ya upangaji uzazi.unajua yeyote anayetumia coil?

Mama Daisy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Enjoy getting to know your baby: Talk to them and learn their signals when they are sleepy or hungry. Some babies when they are hungry cry while others suck on their hands and some smack their lips or turn their head to look for the breast or bottle. Have you noticed a pattern with your baby?

Mama Angel, this is Brenda from Mathare. Enjoy getting to know your baby: Talk to them and learn their signals when they are sleepy or hungry. Some babies when they are hungry cry while others suck on their hands and some smack their lips or turn their head to look for the breast or bottle. Have you noticed a pattern with your baby?

Brenda, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies often breath fast but it can be a problem if they are grunting, their nose flares or they are wheezing. You should come to clinic if you notice any of these. Is your baby having any issues with their breathing or feeding?
Mueni, this is Brenda from Mathare. Have you had your baby? We are here for you. Please let us know as soon as you deliver so we can assist you after the baby arrives.

Faith, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Kwa wiki mbili za kuzaliwa mtoto mchanga kwa kawaida anaweza kulia hadi masaa mawili kwa siku. Hakikisha mtoto wako hana njaa, machovu au ana diaper chafu. Jihadharini na nini kinachoshawishi mtoto wako kama kuimba, kumbembeleza au kunyonya. Je! Mtoto wako analia kwa zaidi ya daika 30 wakati yuko macho? Je! Una matatizo yoyote?

Min Chris, maen Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Tem matek ibi e clinic mari di ngwen. Mondo wapim rembi kendo wakonyi loso chenro mari mar nyuol. Ee limbe mar angwen, wabiro ng'iyo ka nyathini onindo maber. Be dibed gi penjo moro amora ka lure kod wach nyuol mari? To bende iwinjo ka nyathi tugoga?

Henrica, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies normally poo once per day but some go more often. If your baby is going less than three times per week and is fussy they may need some help. Are you having any concerns?

Karibu kwa Mobile WACh NEO. Kazi nzuri kwa kuja kwa ziara yako ya kliniki! Utapokea SMS /ujumbe mfupi kila wiki ambayo itakusaidia wakati wa ujauzito na miezi mbili za kwanza za maisha ya mtoto wako.Tafadhali tutumie SMS/ujumbe mfupi na uuulize maswali au mashaka yoyote unayo.
Mama Flocia, this is Brenda from Mathare. How are you feeling? It is normal to still feel tired and have some pain from after delivery.

Zena, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. kufura vibaya kwa mikono na uso au kuumwa vibaya na kichwa ni ishara ya shida. Ambia familia yako wakupeleke kliniki wakiona haya. Umekuwa na kufura yoyote au kuumwa na kichwa kwa huu ujauzito? Zinaendelea kuzidi?

Stella, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Stella huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Umejifunguwa? Tuko hapa kwa ajili yako. Tafadhali tujulishe mara tu unapojifunguwa ili tuweze kukusaidia baada ya mtoto kuzaliwa.

Mama Rodney, this is Brenda from Mathare. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Without that treatment, the mother and baby could die. Therefore it is safest to deliver in a facility that can manage these and other problems. How will you arrive at the facility?

Min Acheng, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Be isetiyo gi sindan e yor komo nyuol? Otio maber ne mine mang'eny to en kare kidhodho. Mon moko rembegi biro sama ok kare, moko remo bironegi matin moko to yudo mang'eny. Ka digomb yudo remo ma ochanre to ma ok dibed yor komo nyuol maber kodi.
Mama Terry, this is Brenda from Mathare. You should come to the facility if you have heavy bleeding, severe pain, fevers, fits or a bad headache. Have you had any of these problems?

Kareen, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare.Kipande cha kitovu kilichofungwa kitakauka na kuanguka baada ya wiki 1-3. Kunaweza kutoka damu kidogo. Ikiwa eneo la kitovu ni chungu, nyekundu au kutokwa uzaa wa harufu mbaya , tafadhali uje kwenye kliniki. Je, eneo hilo lipona vizuri?

Grace, huyu ni Brenda kutoka kwa Mathare. Asante kwa kuwa nasi kwa Mobile WACh NEO. SMS zitaacha kuja hivi karibuni lakini bado unaweza kuuliza maswali. Je, huu mradi umekuwa wa manufaa kwako na kwa mtoto wako?

Maureen, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto kwa kawaida huenda haja kubwa mara moja kwa siku lakini baadhi huenda mara nyingi zaidi. Ikiwa mtoto wako anaenda haja kubwa chini ya mara tatu kwa wiki na anasumbua anaweza kuwa unahitaji usaidizi. Je! Una matatizo yoyote?

Warwaki e mobile WACh NEO! Itimo maber kuom biro e limbe Mari! Ibiro yudo SMS /ote machwok juma ka juma mabiro konyi ndalo ma ipek kod dweche ariyo mokwongo e ngima mar nyathini. Wakwayi mondo idwuok SMS / ote machwok kendo inyiswa penjo kata wach moro amora ma in go. Daher paroni ni nas oknyal duoko ote ma chuok gotieno gi ngeso gi jumapil.

Martha, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Mercy, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Mtoto wako anaweza kuwa ameanza kusimamisha kichwa mwentewe. Tenga dakika chache kila siku ucheze na yeye akiwa amealala kwa tumbo. Hii itawasaidia kujenga misuli inayohitajika kwa kutambaa. Fanya kazi hadi dakika 15 kwa siku. Una maswali yoyote kuhusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako?

Joyce, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Hakikisha umekuja kwa huduma ya ujauzito hata mpaka mwisho wa ujauzito wako. Tuangalie kama kuna shida yoyote na tukusaidia kupanga mpango wa kujifungua. Una maswali au wasiwasi wowote? Je, unasikia mtoto akicheza mara kwa mara?

Nancy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Make sure you come in for antenatal care even at the end of your pregnancy. We check for any problems and help you prepare a birth plan. Do you have any questions or concerns? Are you feeling the baby move often?

Sherline, this is Brenda from Mathare Bad swelling of hands and face or a bad headache are signs of a problem. Ask your family to take you to the clinic if they see this. Have you had any swelling or headaches during pregnancy? Are they getting worse?

Warwaki e mobile WACh NEO! Itimo maber kuom biro e limbe Mari! Ibiro yudo SMS /ote machwok juma ka juma mabiro konyi ndalo ma ipek kod dweche ariyo mokwongo e ngima mar nyathini. Wakwayi mondo idwuok SMS / ote machwok kendo inyiswa penjo kata wach moro amora ma in go.
Ruth, this is Brenda from Mathare. Family planning methods work differently for different women. What methods have you used in the past? Did you like these methods? Do you plan to use them again?

Rhoda, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Rhoda huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Umejifunguwa? Tuko hapa kwa ajili yako. Tafadhali tujulishe mara tu unapojifunguwa ili tuweze kukusaidia baada ya mtoto kuzaliwa.

Molline, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is safest for all women to deliver in a health facility because health workers have the skills and equipment needed to help ensure a safe delivery and a healthy baby. Where do you plan to deliver?
Rose, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Thank you for joining us in Mobile WACh NEO. The messages will stop soon though you can still ask questions. Has this been helpful for you are your baby?
Caro, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Have you had your baby? We are here for you. Please let us know as soon as you deliver so we can assist you after the baby arrives.
Judith, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby is due for polio, DPT and the pneumococcal vaccines. Has your baby received the 6 week vaccines from the clinic?
Villie, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Have you had your baby? We are here for you. Please let us know as soon as you deliver so we can assist you after the baby arrives.
Grace07, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mbinu zakupanga uzazi huwa tofauti kwa wanawake tofauti. Njia zipi umewahi kutumia awali? Ulizipenda una mpango wa kuzitumia tena?

Hellen, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Hakikisha umekuja kwa huduma ya ujauzito hata mpaka mwisho wa ujauzito wako. Tuangalie kama kuna shida yoyote na tukusaidia kupanga mpango wa kujifungua. Una maswali au wasiwasi wowote? Je, unasikia mtoto akicheza mara kwa mara?

Sarah, this is Brenda from Mathare. If your baby has frequent spitting up or vomiting, makes gagging noises and seems uncomfortable, this may be reflux. Smaller more frequent feedings and keeping the baby upright after feeding can help. Is your baby having any isseus with feeding?
Maren, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Your baby is due for polio, DPT and the pneumococcal vaccines. Has your baby received the 6 week vaccines from the clinic?

Mama Stafo, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. We are checking to see how you are doing. How is your bleeding? Do you have any pain in your lower abdomen? Any fevers? Please let us know if you feel unwell.
Mama Triza, this is Brenda from Mathare. Have you had your baby? Please let us know if you are having any problems. Where are you delivering your baby?

Akeyo, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. This week our messages will be stopping. Please come in for your final visit with us when your baby is about 14 weeks old. Let us know if you have any diffculty coming in. We would like to know your experience with us and if this service has been helpful. We look forward to seeing you.

Seline, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mpaka mtoto wako akifikia miezi 3 unapaswa kumleta kliniki au hospitalini ikiwa ana homa au hana hamu ya kula au anaonekana dhaifu sana. Jaribu kutompa mtoto wako dawa bila kuzungumza nurse. Umeona chochote cha kupa wasiwasi wiki hii?

Diana, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies often breath fast but it can be a problem if they are grunting, their nose flares or they are wheezing. You should come to clinic if you notice any of these. Is your baby having any issues with their breathing or feeding?

Mama Grace, this is Brenda from Mathare. This week our messages will be stopping. Please come in for your final visit with us when your baby is about 14 weeks old. Let us know if you have any difficulty coming in. We would like to know your experience with us and if this service has been helpful. We look forward to seeing you.

Mama Esther, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Thank you for joining us in Mobile WACh NEO. This is the last message from us. Please be sure to come and see us for your last program visit! When is your next visit? Please let us know so we can schedule you to come in to see us.

Mercy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Your baby may be trying to hold up their head. Spend a few minutes each day playing while they lay on their stomach. This will help them develop muscles they need to start crawling. Work up to 15 minutes a day. Do you have any questions about your baby's development?
Mama Triza, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Umejifunguwa? Tuko hapa kwa ajili yako. Tafadhali tujulishe mara tu unapojifunguwa ili tuweze kukusaidia baada ya mtoto kuzaliwa.

Evelyne, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Yuak mar nyathi nyalo kelo paro ne jonyuol. Ka nyathini yuak ahinya moloyo saboro kata godhiambo nyalo bedo ni iye rame. Tem ikete konindo auma e bamni ti rudhone ne toke kata inyalo kete badi kawie ong'io piny ti swuoye. Nyiswa kineno magi kendo kidwaro puonj moko.

Nancy, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Kwa wiki chache zijazo tutakutumia ujumbe mfupi ambao utakusaidia kufanya uamuzi wa upangaji uzazi.kupanga familia na kuwacha nafasi katikati ya mimba moja na ingine ni nzuri kwa afya yako.Je, kwa siku za usoni unanapanga kupata mimba ingine?

Nelly, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Unahisije? Maziwa ya mama ni chakula bora kwa mtoto na hutoa chakula na maji yote ambayo mtoto anahitaji. Inalinda mtoto mchanga dhidi ya maambukizi. Mtoto anapaswa kunyonyesha mara nane kwa siku katika mwezi wa kwanza. Je! Kunyonyesha kunakukupelekaje wewe na mtoto?

Alice, this is Brenda from Mathare. Until your baby reaches 3 months you should always bring your baby to the clinic or hospital if they are having a fever or have no appretite or seem very fatigued. Try not to give your baby medication without talking to the nurse. Have you noticed anything concerning this week?

Min Daughter, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Samoro mio ka omako ich mokuongo onyalo bedo gi kuyo kata paro mang'eny gi wasiwasi. Mae timore ne mon mang'eny to nyalo mio gi mirima mar yuak kod koso nindo. Bende in gi shida makamagi?
Purity, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby is due for polio, DPT and the pneumococcal vaccines. Has your baby received the 6 week vaccines from the clinic?

Mama Scholar, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. kunyonyesha mtoto punde anapozaliwa husaidia maziwa kutoka. Maziwa ya kwanza ya manjano yana vitamini mingi na huzuia mtoto kutokana na magonjwa. Maziwa yana maji yote ambayo mtoto anahitaji,jiepushe na vinywaji vingine. Umepanga kunyonyesha?

Mama Leon, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Brenda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako anaweza kuwa ameanza kusimamisha kichwa mwentewe. Tenga dakika chache kila siku ucheze na yeye akiwa amealala kwa tumbo. Hii itawasaidia kujenga misuli inayohitajika kwa kutambaa. Fanya kazi hadi dakika 15 kwa siku. Una maswali yoyote kuhusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako?
Maurine, ma en Mercy koa Rachuonyo. Idhi nade kod nyathini ?nyathini koro nijumbe adek,bende ne isethi e clinic mondo ongi ngima nyathini?
Vivian, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Idhi nade? pod inyalo winjo olo kod rem bang nyuol

Tem ikete konindo auma e bamni ti rudhone ne toke kata inyalo kete badi kawie ong'io piny ti swuoye. Nyiswa kineno magi kendo kidwaro puonj moko.

Cynthia, this is Brenda from Mathare. Thank you for joining us in Mobile WACh NEO. This is the last message from us. Please be sure to come and see us for your last program visit! When is your next visit? Please let us know so we can schedule you to come in to see us.

Madam Ileli, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. implant ni ya upangaji uzazi.inawekwa kwenye mkono wako na ina ufanisi kwa miaka mitatu.implant inaweza kutolewa wakati wowote!uliza kuhusu implant kwa ziara yako ya upangaji uzazi.unaswali lolote kuhusu implant?

Eva, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Wiki hii SMS zitaacha. Tafadhali kuja utone kwako ziara yako ya mwisho mtoto wako akifikisha wiki 14 . Tujulisha ikiwa una tatizo lolote kwa kuja kutuona. Tungependa kujdiffcultyua ushirikiano wetu na wewe umekuwaje na ikiwa huu mradi umekusaidia. Tunatarajia kukuona.
Aduda, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. How are you and your baby doing? Your baby is about 3 weeks old. Have you been to the clinic for the 2 week check?

Mama Getrude, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Unapaswa kumpeleka mtoto kwenye kituo cha afya ikiwa mtoto hanyonyi vizuri, ana jinyoosha jinsi isiyo ya kawaida, ana pumua kwa haraka au hachezi vizuri kama kawaida.Mtoto wako ana matatizo yeyote haya? Tafadhali tujulishe kama mtoto wako ana matatizo haya au mengine?

Laventer, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Thank you for joining us in Mobile WACh NEO. This is the last message from us. Please be sure to come and see us for your last program visit! When is your next visit? Please let us know so we can schedule you to come in to see us.

Alice, this is Brenda from Mathare. This week our messages will be stopping. Please come in for your final visit with us when your baby is about 14 weeks old. Let us know if you have any difficulty coming in. We would like to know your experience with us and if this service has been helpful. We look forward to seeing you.
Dama, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Family planning methods work differently for different women. What methods have you used in the past? Did you like these methods? Do you plan to use them again?

Mercy, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Ni salama sana kwa wanawake wote kujifungua katika kituo cha afya kwa sababu wafanyakazi wa afya wana ujuzi na vifaa vinavyohitajika kusaidia kuhakikisha unajifungua salama na unajifungua mtoto mwenye afya. Unapanga kujifungua wapi?

Hellen, huyu ni Brenda kutoka kwa Mathare. Asante kuwa nasi kwa Mobile WACh NEO. Hii ndiyo SMS ya mwisho kutoka kwetu. Tafadhali hakikisha umekuja kutuona kwa ziara yako ya mwisho ya huu mradi! Unarudi clinic lini? Tafadhali tujulishe ili tupange uje utuone.

Karibu kwa Mobile WACh NEO. Kazi nzuri kwa kuja kwa ziara yako ya kliniki! Utapokea SMS /ujumbe mfupi kila wiki ambayo itakusaidia wakati wa ujauzito na miezi mbili za kwanza za maisha ya mtoto wako.Tafadhali tutumie SMS/ujumbe mfupi na uuulize maswali au mashaka yoyote unayo.

Jackie, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wakati mwingine matatizo hutokea wakati unaumwa na wakati wa kujifungua, kama kutokwa na damu au mishtuko ya kifafa , ambayo yanahitaji wafanyakazi wa afya wenye ujuzi, dawa na vifaa vya kutibu. Bila matibabu hayo, mama na mtoto wanaweza kufariki. Kwa hivyo ni salama kabisa kujifungua katika kituo ambacho kinaweza kushughulikia matatizo haya na mengine zaidi. Utafikaje kwenye kituo?

Mama Juli, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Brenda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako anaweza kuwa ameanza kusimamisha kichwa mwentewe. Tenga dakika chache kila siku ucheze na yeye akiwa amealala kwa tumbo. Hii itawasaidia kujenga misuli inayohitajika kwa kutambaa. Fanya kazi hadi dakika 15 kwa siku. Una maswali yoyote kuhusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako?

Judy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Make sure you come in 4 times for antenatal care. We check your blood to see if it is strong, check for any problems and help you prepare a birth plan. The 4th visit includes checking that the baby is in a good position. Do you have any questions or concerns? Are you feeling the baby move often?

Mama Mike., this is Brenda from Mathare. Newborns sleep a lot but won't stay asleep for more than 2-4 hours at a time. You may still be up several times at night to change, feed and comfort your baby. Take naps with your baby and try and interact with your baby during the day and keep things dark and quiet at night. How is the baby sleeping?

Mama Finley, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Sometimes new mothers can feel sad, anxious or worried all the time. This happens to many women and can cause crying and difficulty sleeping. Are you having any of these problems?

Mama Stano, this is Brenda from Mathare. You should be starting labour soon. Make sure to bring cotton wool , clothes for you and the baby and any medications you need to the hospital. Do you have any questions about what to bring?

Mama Grano, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto hulala wakati mwingi. Wakati mtoto ako macho, watanyoosha mikono na miguu na kutingiza kichwa. Ikiwa mtoto hajinyoroshi wakati ako macho, jaribu kuchochea mtoto kwa kugusagusa miguu yake. Mtoto akijinyoosha kisha aache, hii ni ishara ya tatizo baya na mtoto hayuko sawa kabisa. Au ikiwa mtoto hajinyooshi kabisa, hii ni ishara ya tatizo hatari. Je, mtoto wako anajinyoosha wakati yuko macho?

Mama Nigel, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto hulala wakati mwingi. Wakati mtoto ako macho, watanyoosha mikono na miguu na kutingiza kichwa. Ikiwa mtoto hajinyoroshi wakati ako macho, jaribu kuchochea mtoto kwa kugusagusa miguu yake. Mtoto akijinyoosha kisha aache, hii ni ishara ya tatizo baya na mtoto hayuko sawa kabisa. Au ikiwa mtoto hajinyooshi kabisa, hii ni ishara ya tatizo hatari. Je, mtoto wako anajinyoosha wakati yuko macho?

Ebby, this is Brenda from Mathare. Breastfeeding a baby right after birth helps the milk come. The first yellow sticky milk has many vitamins & cleans out the stomach. Milk has all the water the baby needs, avoid other liquids. Are you planning to breastfeed?

Nancy Kwamboka, this is Brenda from Mathare. Thank you for joining us in Mobile WACh NEO. This is the last message from us. Please be sure to come and see us for your last program visit! When is your next visit? Please let us know so we can schedule you to come in to see us.

Ikiwa mtoto hajinyoroshi wakati ako macho, jaribu kuchochea mtoto kwa kugusagusa miguu yake. Mtoto akijinyoosha kisha aache, hii ni ishara ya tatizo baya na mtoto hayuko sawa kabisa. Au ikiwa mtoto hajinyooshi kabisa, hii ni ishara ya tatizo hatari. Je, mtoto wako anajinyoosha wakati yuko macho?
Mama Mutethya, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Unahisije? Ni kawaida bado kusikia uchovu na kuwa na maumivu hata baada ya kujifunguwa.
Alphine, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. How are you and your baby doing? Your baby is about 3 weeks old. Have you been to the clinic for the 2 week check?

Flo, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Kipande cha kitovu kilichofungwa kitakauka na kuanguka baada ya wiki 1-3. Kunaweza kutoka damu kidogo. Ikiwa eneo la kitovu ni chungu, nyekundu au kutokwa uzaa wa harufu mbaya , tafadhali uje kwenye kliniki. Je, eneo hilo lipona vizuri?

Mama Mutethya,huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Kupata damu ya mwezi bila mpangilio huwa kawaida wakati unanyonyesha na wakati unatumia njia zingine za kupanga uzazi. Haimaanishi kuna kitu mbaya. Una changamoto juu ya kupata damu ya mwezi wakati unatumia njia ya kupanga uzazi?

Una maswali yoyote kuhusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako?

Mama Jan, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies often breath fast but it can be a problem if they are grunting, their nose flares or they are wheezing. You should come to clinic if you notice any of these. Is your baby having any issues with their breathing or feeding?

Mama Damson, this is Brenda from Mathare. When you start a family planning method, sometimes there can be side effects or your body may take time to adjust. Usually these subside within weeks. Joy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. Mamie, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. Wakati mwingine matatizo hutokea wakati unaumwa na wakati wa kujifungua, kama kutokwa na damu au mishtuko ya kifafa , ambayo yanahitaji wafanyakazi wa afya wenye ujuzi, dawa na vifaa vya kutibu. Bila matibabu hayo, mama na mtoto wanaweza kufariki. Kwa hivyo ni salama kabisa kujifungua katika kituo ambacho kinaweza kushughulikia matatizo haya na mengine zaidi. Utafikaje kwenye kituo?

Mama Manu, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is safest for all women to deliver in a health facility because health workers have the skills and equipment needed to help ensure a safe delivery and a healthy baby. Where do you plan to deliver?

Teacher, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies at this age may be smiling and even reaching for things. Try putting a rattle or toy in their grasp and see what happens. Is your baby reaching for things? Do you have any concerns?

Harriet, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies often breath faster than older children but when it is very fast, this can be a sign of infection. The baby should breath less than 60 times per minute. If you are worried about your baby's breathing try and count the number of breaths in one minute. Have you noticed problems with the baby's breathing?

Min Edwin, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Dhodho nyathi ban'g nyuol konyo chak wuok. Chak makuongo mopoto maraton'g nigi dhadhu mang'eny kendo gengo tuoche. Chak nitie kod pi ma nyathi dwaro, kik imi nyathi gimoro amora mimadho. Bende ipango dhodho nyathi?
Misty, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wewe na mtoto wako mnaendeleaje? Mtoto wako ana wiki tatu hivi sasa. Je, ulimpeleka kliniki ya wiki mbili ya kuangaliwa?

Nyambuga, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Breastfeeding a baby right after birth helps the milk come. The first yellow sticky milk has many vitamins & cleans out the stomach. Milk has all the water the baby needs, avoid other liquids. Are you planning to breastfeed?

Betty, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Kipande cha kitovu kilichofungwa kitakauka na kuanguka baada ya wiki 1-3. Kunaweza kutoka damu kidogo. Ikiwa eneo la kitovu ni chungu, nyekundu au kutokwa uzaa wa harufu mbaya , tafadhali uje kwenye kliniki. Je, eneo hilo lipona vizuri?
Dama, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Have you had your baby? We are here for you. Please let us know as soon as you deliver so we can assist you after the baby arrives.

Dorothy, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby may be trying to hold up their head. Spend a few minutes each day playing while they lay on their stomach. This will help them develop muscles they need to start crawling. Work up to 15 minutes a day. Do you have any questions about your baby's development?

Mama Wayne, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto hulala wakati mwingi. Wakati mtoto ako macho, watanyoosha mikono na miguu na kutingiza kichwa. Ikiwa mtoto hajinyoroshi wakati ako macho, jaribu kuchochea mtoto kwa kugusagusa miguu yake. Mtoto akijinyoosha kisha aache, hii ni ishara ya tatizo baya na mtoto hayuko sawa kabisa. Au ikiwa mtoto hajinyooshi kabisa, hii ni ishara ya tatizo hatari. Je, mtoto wako anajinyoosha wakati yuko macho?

Siri, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto katika umri huu wanaweza kutabasu na hata kufikia vitu. Jaribu kuweka shaker au toy katika mkono wake na kuona nini atafanya. Je, mtoto wako anafikia vitu na una matatizo yoyote?

Violet, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Dotty, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. Ikiwa sehemu hiyo ya kichwa ya kupumulia imeingia ndani sana hiyo inaweza kuwa ishara ya kutokuwa na maji mwilini. Inaweza pia kufura kidogo mtoto akilia, lakini inapaswa kurudi kwa kawaida wakati anaacha - ikiwa sivyo, mpeleke kwa daktari au muuguzi. Umeona yeyote haya?
Euny, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. We are checking to see how you are doing. How is your bleeding? Do you have any pain in your lower abdomen? Any fevers? Please let us know if you feel unwell.

Triza, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Brenda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako anaweza kuwa ameanza kusimamisha kichwa mwentewe. Tenga dakika chache kila siku ucheze na yeye akiwa amealala kwa tumbo. Hii itawasaidia kujenga misuli inayohitajika kwa kutambaa. Fanya kazi hadi dakika 15 kwa siku. Una maswali yoyote kuhusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako?
Tabby, this is Brenda from Mathare. Have you had your baby? We are here for you. Please let us know as soon as you deliver so we can assist you after the baby arrives.

Mama Achieng, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Moja baadhi ya mahali mtoto anaweza kupata maambukizi ni ngozi. Uzaa na ngozi kuwa nyekundu ni ishara za maambukizi. Kuna uzaa wowote unaotoka kwenye kitovu cha mtoto? Kuna upele wowote kwa ngozi?

Magie, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Try not to give your baby medication without talking to the nurse. Have you noticed anything concerning this week?

Mama Grace, this is Brenda from Mathare. Newborns need to be kept warm. Dry the baby right after birth and keep the baby skin-to-skin with you. Please avoid baths in the first days. When a baby gets sick they can be very hot or very cold. Does the baby seem hot or cold? Do you have a thermometer?

Mama Sheldon, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. This was nature's way of allowing their head to pass through the birth canal . If the fontanelle becomes sunken it can be a sign of dehydration. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop  if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?

Phylis, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby is due for polio, DPT and the pneumococcal vaccines. Has your baby received the 6 week vaccines from the clinic?

Mama Ann, this is Brenda from Mathare. By two weeks old a typical newborn may cry up to 2 hours a day. Make sure your baby is not hungry, tired or has a soiled diaper. Pay attention to what soothes your baby like singing, rocking, swaddling or sucking. Does your baby cry for more than 30 minutes at a time? Are you having any problems?
Mama Gody, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Idhi nade? pod inyalo winjo olo kod rem bang nyuol

Mama Joel, ma en Mercy koa Rachuonyo. Mwende, this is Brenda from Mathare. Newborns sleep a lot but won't stay asleep for more than 2-4 hours at a time. You may still be up several times at night to change, feed and comfort your baby. Take naps with your baby and try and interact with your baby during the day and keep things dark and quiet at night. How is the baby sleeping?

Mama Joy, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Wakati mwingine matatizo hutokea wakati unaumwa na wakati wa kujifungua, kama kutokwa na damu au mishtuko ya kifafa , ambayo yanahitaji wafanyakazi wa afya wenye ujuzi, dawa na vifaa vya kutibu. Bila matibabu hayo, mama na mtoto wanaweza kufariki. Kwa hivyo ni salama kabisa kujifungua katika kituo ambacho kinaweza kushughulikia matatizo haya na mengine zaidi. Utafikaje kwenye kituo?

Mama Fay, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto wachanga mara nyingi hupumua kwa haraka kuliko watoto wakubwa kiasi lakini wakati wanapumua kwa haraka sana, hii inaweza kuwa ishara ya ugonjwa. Mtoto anapaswa kupumua chini ya mara 60 kwa dakika. Ikiwa una wasiwasi juu ya kupumua kwa mtoto wako, jaribu kuhesabu idadi ya pumzi kwa dakika moja. Umegundua tatizo lolote na kupumua kwa mtoto?

Mama Vickie, huyu ni Brenda kutoka kwa Mathare. Asante kuwa nasi kwa Mobile WACh NEO. Hii ndiyo SMS ya mwisho kutoka kwetu. Tafadhali hakikisha umekuja kutuona kwa ziara yako ya mwisho ya huu mradi! Unarudi clinic lini? Tafadhali tujulishe ili tupange uje utuone.
Vicky, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Thank you for joining us in Mobile WACh NEO. The messages will stop soon though you can still ask questions. Has this been helpful for you are your baby?
Lillian Makena, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Your baby is due for polio, DPT and the pneumococcal vaccines. Has your baby received the 6 week vaccines from the clinic?

Wakati mwingine matatizo hutokea wakati unaumwa na wakati wa kujifungua, kama kutokwa na damu au mishtuko ya kifafa , ambayo yanahitaji wafanyakazi wa afya wenye ujuzi, dawa na vifaa vya kutibu. Freshman, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Without that treatment, the mother and baby could die. Therefore it is safest to deliver in a facility that can manage these and other problems. How will you arrive at the facility?
Mama Shirleen, this is Brenda from Mathare. How are you feeling? It is normal to still feel tired and have some pain from after delivery.

Mama Vicky, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Kwa wiki chache zijazo tutakutumia ujumbe mfupi ambao utakusaidia kufanya uamuzi wa upangaji uzazi.kupanga familia na kuwacha nafasi katikati ya mimba moja na ingine ni nzuri kwa afya yako.Je, kwa siku za usoni unanapanga kupata mimba ingine?
Mama Achieng, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Unahisije? Ni kawaida bado kusikia uchovu na kuwa na maumivu hata baada ya kujifunguwa.

Mama Tahmeed, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby may be trying to hold up their head. Spend a few minutes each day playing while they lay on their stomach. This will help them develop muscles they need to start crawling. Work up to 15 minutes a day. Do you have any questions about your baby's development?

Welcome to Mobile WACh NEO! Good job coming in for your visit! You will receive weekly SMS to help support you during pregnancy and during the first months of your baby's life. Please SMS and tell us any questions or concerns you have. Just a reminder that the nurse is not able to respond nights and weekends!

Nyambuga, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo Bad swelling of hands and face or a bad headache are signs of a problem. Ask your family to take you to the clinic if they see this. Have you had any swelling or headaches during pregnancy? Are they getting worse?

Loreen, this is Brenda from Mathare. Breastfeeding a baby right after birth helps the milk come. The first yellow sticky milk has many vitamins & cleans out the stomach. Milk has all the water the baby needs, avoid other liquids. Are you planning to breastfeed?

Flozy, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo.Kipande cha kitovu kilichofungwa kitakauka na kuanguka baada ya wiki 1-3. Kunaweza kutoka damu kidogo. Ikiwa eneo la kitovu ni chungu, nyekundu au kutokwa uzaa wa harufu mbaya , tafadhali uje kwenye kliniki. Je, eneo hilo lipona vizuri?

Tafline, this is Brenda from Mathare. Breastfeeding a baby immediately after birth helps the milk come. The first yellow sticky milk has many vitamins & protects the baby from illness. Milk has all the water the baby needs, avoid other liquids. Are you planning to breastfeed?

Min Chris, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Ka nyathi neno to otingo badene kod tiendene kod wiye ,ka nyathi ok ting tiende kata bade to onego item gido tiende, ka nyathi tingo to weyo to mano nyalo bendo ranyisi marach kendo nyathi ok ngima ,bende nyathini tugoga ka ok onindi?

Sellestine, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Crying can be very distressing for parents. If your baby cries for a long time especially in the late afternoon or evening, this may be colic. Try lying your baby across your lap on his tummy and rub his back or rocking him face down across your arm. Let us know if you exeprience this an need more advice.

Qeenlencer, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Sometimes new mothers can feel sad, anxious or worried all the time. This happens to many women and can cause crying and difficulty sleeping. Are you having any of these problems?

Min Cathy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Irregular bleeding is very common while breastfeeding, and on some family planning methods. It does not mean that something is wrong. Do you have any concerns about bleeding while using family planning?

Rozy, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto kwa kawaida huenda haja kubwa mara moja kwa siku lakini baadhi huenda mara nyingi zaidi. Ikiwa mtoto wako anaenda haja kubwa chini ya mara tatu kwa wiki na anasumbua anaweza kuwa unahitaji usaidizi. Je! Una matatizo yoyote?
Mama Junior, this is Brenda from Mathare. Thank you for joining us in Mobile WACh NEO. The messages will stop soon though you can still ask questions. Has this been helpful for you are your baby?

Elizabeth, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Hakikisha umekuja kwa huduma ya ujauzito hata mpaka mwisho wa ujauzito wako. Tuangalie kama kuna shida yoyote na tukusaidia kupanga mpango wa kujifungua. Una maswali au wasiwasi wowote? Je, unasikia mtoto akicheza mara kwa mara?

Min Felix, ma en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Sani iwinjo nade? Chak mar thuno ema ber moloyo ne nyathi,en kod thout chiemo tee manyathi nyalo dwaro,kendo ogengo nyathi kuom yudo tuoche,nyathi onego dhoth thuno ndalo aboro e odiechieng, edwe mokuongo mar nyuol, bende nyathi thoth maber

Mama Grace, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. kufura vibaya kwa mikono na uso au kuumwa vibaya na kichwa ni ishara ya shida. Ambia familia yako wakupeleke kliniki wakiona haya. Umekuwa na kufura yoyote au kuumwa na kichwa kwa huu ujauzito? Zinaendelea kuzidi?

Jessica, this is Brenda from Mathare. Crying can be very distressing for parents. If your baby cries for a long time especially in the late afternoon or evening, this may be colic. Try lying your baby across your lap on his tummy and rub his back or rocking him face down across your arm. Let us know if you exeprience this an need more advice.
Misty, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako amefikisha wakati wa kupewa polio, DPT na chanjo ya pneumococcal. Je! Mtoto wako amepokea chanjo ya wiki 6 kutoka kliniki?

Philsa, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Babies sleep most of the time. When the baby is awake, they will move their arms and legs and turn their head. If the baby doesn't move when awake, try stimulating the baby by tapping their foot. If the baby moves but stops, this is a danger sign. Or if the baby doesn't move at all, this is a danger sign and the baby is not well at all. Is your baby moving when they are awake?

Janet, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby may be trying to hold up their head. Spend a few minutes each day playing while they lay on their stomach. This will help them develop muscles they need to start crawling. Work up to 15 minutes a day. Do you have any questions about your baby's development?

Mama Flocia, this is Brenda from Mathare. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Without that treatment, the mother and baby could die. Therefore it is safest to deliver in a facility that can manage these and other problems. How will you arrive at the facility?

Mama Amina, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako ana sehemu mbili za laini kwenye kichwa chake (fontanelles) ambako mifupa ya fuvu bado haijaunganishwa. Hii ilikuwa njia ya asili ya kuruhusu kichwa chake kupita kwa njia ya uzazi wakati wa kujifungua. Ikiwa sehemu hiyo ya kichwa ya kupumulia imeingia ndani sana hiyo inaweza kuwa ishara ya kutokuwa na maji mwilini. Inaweza pia kufura kidogo mtoto akilia, lakini inapaswa kurudi kwa kawaida wakati anaacha - ikiwa sivyo, mpeleke kwa daktari au muuguzi. Umeona yeyote haya?

Min Dan, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Make sure you come in for antenatal care even at the end of your pregnancy. We check for any problems and help you prepare a birth plan. Do you have any questions or concerns? Are you feeling the baby move often?

Mama Jason, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Kulia inaweza kuwa shida sana kwa wazazi. Ikiwa mtoto wako analia kwa muda mrefu haswa mchana au jioni, hii inaweza kuwa anaumwa na tumbo. Jaribu kumlaza mtoto wako kwenye paja lako kwa tumbo yake na kumsugua mgongo au kumtuliza kwa mikono yako ukiwa umebeba uso chini. Tujulishe kama una hii shida na unahitaji ushauri zaidi.

Susan, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Unapaswa kumpeleka mtoto kwenye kituo cha afya ikiwa mtoto hanyonyi vizuri, ana jinyoosha jinsi isiyo ya kawaida, ana pumua kwa haraka au hachezi vizuri kama kawaida.Mtoto wako ana matatizo yeyote haya? Tafadhali tujulishe kama mtoto wako ana matatizo haya au mengine?

Mama Linet, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. This was nature's way of allowing their head to pass through the birth canal . If the fontanelle becomes sunken it can be a sign of dehydration. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop  if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?
Adory, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Have you had your baby? We are here for you. Please let us know as soon as you deliver so we can assist you after the baby arrives.

Mary Nduku, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mary Nduku huyu niBrenda kutokaMathareUmejifunguwa ? Tuko hapa kwa ajili yako. Tafadhali tujulishe mara tu unapojifunguwa ili tuweze kukusaidia baada ya mtoto kuzaliwa.

Awuor, maen Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Tem matek ibi e clinic mari di ngwen. Mondo wapim rembi kendo wakonyi loso chenro mari mar nyuol. Ee limbe mar angwen, wabiro ng'iyo ka nyathini onindo maber. Be dibed gi penjo moro amora ka lure kod wach nyuol mari? To bende iwinjo ka nyathi tugoga?

Mama Bryan, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Unaeza kuanza uchungu wa uzazi hivi karibuni. Hakikisha umekuja na pamba,nguo zako na za mtoto na madawa yoyote unayohitaji hospitalini. Una swali lolote kuhusu vitu utakavyo kuja navyo?

Purity, this is Brenda from Mathare. The umbilical cord stump will dry up and fall off after 1-3 weeks. There may be a little bleeding. If the area is painful, red or has smelly discharge, please come to the clinic. Is the area healing well?

Mama Vickie, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Umetumia sindano ya kupanga uzazi? Ni bora sana na hufanya vizuri kwa wanawake wengi na ni salama wakati wa kunyonyesha. Wanawake wengine hupata mabadiliko kwa damu ya mwezi -mara nyingi au mara kidogo. Ikiwa hutaki mabadiliko kwa damu yako ya mwezi sindano sio njia bora kwako.

Maurine, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. E jumani wabiro weyo oro ote. Tem ibi ilimwa ka nyathini chiegni romo jumbe apar gi ang'wen. Nyiswa ka in gi shida mar chopo. Dwa her mar ng'eyo kabe ote wa be osekonyi.Wageno neni.

Auma, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Watoto hulala wakati mwingi. Wakati mtoto ako macho, watanyoosha mikono na miguu na kutingiza kichwa. Ikiwa mtoto hajinyoroshi wakati ako macho, jaribu kuchochea mtoto kwa kugusagusa miguu yake. Mtoto akijinyoosha kisha aache, hii ni ishara ya tatizo baya na mtoto hayuko sawa kabisa. Au ikiwa mtoto hajinyooshi kabisa, hii ni ishara ya tatizo hatari. Je, mtoto wako anajinyoosha wakati yuko macho?

Mama Mike, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Brenda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako anaweza kuwa ameanza kusimamisha kichwa mwentewe. Tenga dakika chache kila siku ucheze na yeye akiwa amealala kwa tumbo. Hii itawasaidia kujenga misuli inayohitajika kwa kutambaa. Fanya kazi hadi dakika 15 kwa siku. Una maswali yoyote kuhusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako?

Mama Grace, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto mara nyingi hupumua kwa haraka lakini inaweza kuwa tatizo ikiwa wanapumwa na mlio wa kifua, pua zao zinpanuka au kutoa sauti kifuani wanapopumuwa. Unapaswa kuja kliniki ikiwa unaona yoyote haya. Je! Mtoto wako ana masuala yoyote ya kupumua au kula?

Min Fidel, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Yuak mar nyathi nyalo kelo paro ne jonyuol. Ka nyathini yuak ahinya moloyo saboro kata godhiambo nyalo bedo ni iye rame. Tem ikete konindo auma e bamni ti rudhone ne toke kata inyalo kete badi kawie ong'io piny ti swuoye. Nyiswa kineno magi kendo kidwaro puonj moko.
Misty, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Kunyonyesha kunakupelekaje wewe na mtoto? Unajua mtoto wako alikuwa kilo ngapi alopozaliwa?

Mama Daisy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. The Implant is for family planning. It is placed in your arm and is very effective for 3 years. The Implant can be removed at any time! Ask about the Implant at your family planning visit. Do you have any questions about the Implant?
Mama Collins, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Umejifungua mtoto? Tafadhali tujulishe kama uko na shida yoyote. Utajifungulia wapi?

Colletah, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. Sharon, maen Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Tem matek ibi e clinic mari di ngwen. Mondo wapim rembi kendo wakonyi loso chenro mari mar nyuol. Ee limbe mar angwen, wabiro ng'iyo ka nyathini onindo maber. Be dibed gi penjo moro amora ka lure kod wach nyuol mari? To bende iwinjo ka nyathi tugoga?

Mama Grace, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. This was nature's way of allowing their head to pass through the birth canal . If the fontanelle becomes sunken it can be a sign of dehydration. They may also bulge slightly if the baby is crying, but it should return to normal when they stop  if not, see a doctor or nurse. Have you noticed these?

Mama Joshua, huyu ni Brenda kutoka kwa Mathare. Asante kuwa nasi kwa Mobile WACh NEO. Hii ndiyo SMS ya mwisho kutoka kwetu. Tafadhali hakikisha umekuja kutuona kwa ziara yako ya mwisho ya huu mradi! Unarudi clinic lini? Tafadhali tujulishe ili tupange uje utuone.

Dorothy, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Furahia kumjua mtoto wako: Ongea na yeye na kujifunza ishara yake wakati amelala au ana njaa. Watoto wengine wanapokuwa na njaa hulia na wengine hunyonya mikono yao na wengine hupiga midomo yao au hugeuza kichwa chao ili kuangalia matiti au chupa. Umeona mtindo wa ishara na mtoto wako?

Quinter, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Newborns need to be kept warm. Dry the baby right after birth and keep the baby skin-to-skin with you. Please avoid baths in the first days. When a baby gets sick they can be very hot or very cold. Does the baby seem hot or cold? Do you have a thermometer?

Alice, this is Brenda from Mathare. Newborns sleep a lot but won't stay asleep for more than 2-4 hours at a time. You may still be up several times at night to change, feed and comfort your baby. Take naps with your baby and try and interact with your baby during the day and keep things dark and quiet at night. How is the baby sleeping?
Wangui, this is Brenda from Mathare. Family planning methods work differently for different women. What methods have you used in the past? Did you like these methods? Do you plan to use them again?

Mama Judy, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies sleep most of the time. When the baby is awake, they will move their arms and legs and turn their head. If the baby doesn't move when awake, try stimulating the baby by tapping their foot. If the baby moves but stops, this is a danger sign and the baby is not well at all. Or is the baby doesn't move at all, this is a danger sign. Is your baby moving when they are awake?

Welcome to Mobile WACh NEO! Good job coming in for your visit! You will receive weekly SMS to help support you during pregnancy and during the first months of your baby's life. Please SMS back and tell us any questions or concerns you have.

Ikiwa sehemu hiyo ya kichwa ya kupumulia imeingia ndani sana hiyo inaweza kuwa ishara ya kutokuwa na maji mwilini. Inaweza pia kufura kidogo mtoto akilia, lakini inapaswa kurudi kwa kawaida wakati anaacha - ikiwa sivyo, mpeleke kwa daktari au muuguzi. Umeona yeyote haya?

Mtoto anapaswa kunyonyesha mara nane kwa siku katika mwezi wa kwanza. Je! Kunyonyesha kunakukupelekaje wewe na mtoto?

Brenda, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Hellen, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby has two soft places on their head (fontanelles) where the skull bones haven't yet fused together. Milly, this is Brenda from Mathare. Have you had your baby? We are here for you. Please let us know as soon as you deliver so we can assist you after the baby arrives.
Mama Clanis, this is Brenda from Mathare. How is breastfeeding going for you and the baby? Do you know your baby's weight at birth?

Nyar Gem, mae en Mercy mawuok Rachuonyo. Nyaka nyathini chop dweche adek onego ikele e klinic saa mora mora ma dende ochwakore kata sama dhoge rach kata sama en gi olo.Tem kik imi nyathi yath moramora kapok ineno daktari.Bende isefuenyo gimoro wigni.

Janet, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto mara nyingi hupumua kwa haraka lakini inaweza kuwa tatizo ikiwa wanapumwa na mlio wa kifua, pua zao zinpanuka au kutoa sauti kifuani wanapopumuwa. Unapaswa kuja kliniki ikiwa unaona yoyote haya. Je! Mtoto wako ana masuala yoyote ya kupumua au kula?

Mueni, this is Brenda from Mathare. Breastfeeding a baby right after birth helps the milk come. The first yellow sticky milk has many vitamins & cleans out the stomach. Milk has all the water the baby needs, avoid other liquids. Are you planning to breastfeed?
Martha, huyu ni Mercy kutoka Rachuonyo. Umejifunguwa? Tuko hapa kwa ajili yako. Tafadhali tujulishe mara tu unapojifunguwa ili tuweze kukusaidia baada ya mtoto kuzaliwa.

Mama Nigel, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto katika umri huu wanaweza kutabasu na hata kufikia vitu. Jaribu kuweka shaker au toy katika mkono wake na kuona nini atafanya. Je, mtoto wako anafikia vitu na una matatizo yoyote?

Mercy, this is Brenda from Mathare. Until your baby reaches 3 months you should always bring your baby to the clinic or hospital if they are having a fever or have no appretite or seem very fatigued. Try not to give your baby medication without talking to the nurse. Have you noticed anything concerning this week?

Milly, this is Brenda from Mathare. It is safest for all women to deliver in a health facility because health workers have the skills and equipment needed to help ensure a safe delivery and a healthy baby. Where do you plan to deliver?

Bila matibabu hayo, mama na mtoto wanaweza kufariki. Kwa hivyo ni salama kabisa kujifungua katika kituo ambacho kinaweza kushughulikia matatizo haya na mengine zaidi. Utafikaje kwenye kituo?

Mim Liz, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Have you had your baby? We are here for you. Please let us know as soon as you deliver so we can assist you after the baby arrives.

Sharon, this is Brenda from Mathare. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Petronilla, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Watoto hulala wakati mwingi. Wakati mtoto ako macho, watanyoosha mikono na miguu na kutingiza kichwa. Ikiwa mtoto hajinyoroshi wakati ako macho, jaribu kuchochea mtoto kwa kugusagusa miguu yake. Mtoto akijinyoosha kisha aache, hii ni ishara ya tatizo baya na mtoto hayuko sawa kabisa. Au ikiwa mtoto hajinyooshi kabisa, hii ni ishara ya tatizo hatari. Je, mtoto wako anajinyoosha wakati yuko macho?

Mama Juli, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Furahia kumjua mtoto wako: Ongea na yeye na kujifunza ishara yake wakati amelala au ana njaa. Quinter, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Have you used the injection for Family Planning? It is very effective and works well for many women and is safe while breastfeeding. Some women experience irregular bleeding, less frequent or more frequent periods. If you want regular predicatable periods this may not be the best method for you.

Mama Tahmeed, this is Brenda from Mathare. Thank you for joining us in Mobile WACh NEO. The messages will stop soon though you can still ask questions. Has this been helpful for you are your baby?

Mama Joshua, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Moja baadhi ya mahali mtoto anaweza kupata maambukizi ni ngozi. Uzaa na ngozi kuwa nyekundu ni ishara za maambukizi. Kuna uzaa wowote unaotoka kwenye kitovu cha mtoto? Kuna upele wowote kwa ngozi?

Dorine, this is Brenda from Mathare. Your baby is due for polio, DPT and the pneumococcal vaccines. Has your baby received the 6 week vaccines from the clinic?

Susan, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Brenda, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mtoto wako anaweza kuwa ameanza kusimamisha kichwa mwentewe. Tenga dakika chache kila siku ucheze na yeye akiwa amealala kwa tumbo. Hii itawasaidia kujenga misuli inayohitajika kwa kutambaa. Fanya kazi hadi dakika 15 kwa siku. Una maswali yoyote kuhusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako?

Mama Precious, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mpaka mtoto wako akifikia miezi 3 unapaswa kumleta kliniki au hospitalini ikiwa ana homa au hana hamu ya kula au anaonekana dhaifu sana. Jaribu kutompa mtoto wako dawa bila kuzungumza nurse. Umeona chochote cha kupa wasiwasi wiki hii?

Sharon, this is Brenda from Mathare. One of the places a baby can get an infection is the skin. Pus and redness are signs of infection. Is there pus coming out of the umbilical cord? Does the cord have bad smell. Are there any skin rashes?

Mama Rich, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Ni salama sana kwa wanawake wote kujifungua katika kituo cha afya kwa sababu wafanyakazi wa afya wana ujuzi na vifaa vinavyohitajika kusaidia kuhakikisha unajifungua salama na unajifungua mtoto mwenye afya. Unapanga kujifungua wapi?
Min Dan, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. How are you feeling? It is normal to still feel tired and have some pain from after delivery.

Mercy, this is Brenda from Mathare. Sometimes problems arise during labour and delivery, like bleeding or fits, which require skilled health workers, medications and equipment to treat. Without that treatment, the mother and baby could die. Therefore it is safest to deliver in a facility that can manage these and other problems. How will you arrive at the facility?

Mama Nigel, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Unaeza kuanza uchungu wa uzazi hivi karibuni. Hakikisha umekuja na pamba,nguo zako na za mtoto na madawa yoyote unayohitaji hospitalini. Una swali lolote kuhusu vitu utakavyo kuja navyo?

Mama Jose, this is Brenda from Mathare. If your baby has frequent spitting up or vomiting, makes gagging noises and seems uncomfortable, this may be reflux. Smaller more frequent feedings and keeping the baby upright after feeding can help. Is your baby having any isseus with feeding?

Vio, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Regular, strong stomach pains are a sign of labour. If you feel this strong tightening regularly pains, leaking of fluid or bleeding, go to the facility. Do you feel any contractions? Do you have any concerns?

Emmah, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Make sure you come in 4 times for antenatal care. We check your blood to see if it is strong, check for any problems and help you prepare a birth plan. The 4th visit includes checking that the baby is in a good position. Do you have any questions or concerns? Are you feeling the baby move often?

Teresia, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies sleep most of the time. When the baby is awake, they will move their arms and legs and turn their head. If the baby doesn't move when awake, try stimulating the baby by tapping their foot. If the baby moves but stops, this is a danger sign and the baby is not well at all. Or is the baby doesn't move at all, this is a danger sign. Is your baby moving when they are awake?

Villie, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. The umbilical cord stump will dry up and fall off after 1-3 weeks. There may be a little bleeding. If the area is painful, red or has smelly discharge, please come to the clinic. Is the area healing well?

Emelda, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. It is best to space your children. Think about family planning before you go to the clinic. There are many options and it is your choice. Please talk to the nurse about family planning at the next visit. Can we help with any advice?

Mama Dan, this is Brenda from Mathare. You should take the baby to the health facility if the baby stops breastfeeding well, has any abnormal movement such as jerking or stiffening, has fast breathing or becomes less active. Does your baby have any of those problems? Please let us know if your baby has any of these or other problems?

Mwende, this is Brenda from Mathare. Over the next few weeks we will send you messages to help you make family planning decisions. Planning your family and spacing pregnancy is good for your health. Are you planning another pregnancy in the future?

Mama May, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Sometimes new mothers can feel sad, anxious or worried all the time. This happens to many women and can cause crying and difficulty sleeping. Are you having any of these problems?

Jacky, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. How are you feeling? Breast milk is the best food for the baby and provides all the food and fluid that the baby needs. It protects the infant against infections. A baby should be breastfed at least 8 times a day in the first month. How is breastfeeding going for you and the baby?

Joy, this is Mercy from Rachuonyo. Irregular bleeding is very common while breastfeeding, and on some family planning methods. It does not mean that something is wrong. Do you have any concerns about bleeding while using family planning?

Mama Loise, huyu ni Brenda kutoka Mathare. Mpaka mtoto wako akifikia miezi 3 unapaswa kumleta kliniki au hospitalini ikiwa ana homa au hana hamu ya kula au anaonekana dhaifu sana. Jaribu kutompa mtoto wako dawa bila kuzungumza nurse. Umeona chochote cha kupa wasiwasi wiki hii?

Sarah, this is Brenda from Mathare. Babies at this age may be smiling and even reaching for things. Try putting a rattle or toy in their grasp and see what happens. Is your baby reaching for things? Do you have any concerns?
